metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5444 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle MySQL 5.5.48 and earlier, 5.6.29 andearlier, and 5.7.11 and earlier and MariaDB before 5.5.49, 10.0.x before10.0.25, and 10.1.x before 10.1.14 allows remote attackers to affectconfidentiality via vectors related to Server: Connection.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5444` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysqlclient20 - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1.1
mysql-client - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1.1
mysql-client-5.7 - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1.1
mysql-client-core-5.7 - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1.1
mysql-common - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1.1
mysql-server - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1.1
mysql-server-5.7 - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1.1
mysql-server-core-5.7 - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1.1
mysql-source-5.7 - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1.1
mysql-testsuite - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1.1
mysql-testsuite-5.7 - 5.7.12-0ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

libmariadbd18 - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-10.0 - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-core-10.0 - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-common - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-connect - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-mroonga - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-oqgraph - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-spider - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-tokudb - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-10.0 - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-core-10.0 - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-test - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-test-data - 10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

percona-xtradb-cluster-server - 5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
percona-xtradb-cluster-server-5.6 - 5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
percona-xtradb-cluster-source-5.6 - 5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mysql-5.7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.7.12-0ubuntu1.1').
mariadb-10.0 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '10.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.6.34-26.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
percona-server-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
